305.heading: Sports Clubs.
305.title: "Die Killer" p. 11 in Ein Fest für Rudi
305.author: Peter Puck.
notes: Summary (by M. Harbeck): Rudi and Fred appear to be hired robbers intruding on a suburban family and threatening them with guns, but turn out to be greeting card messengers for the family's father's birthday hired by his sports club fellows.
